author: adosiawolf
title: market jetchicken NFT card game
description: jetchicken is a aligning for play-to-earn with the appeal to attract new users to Cardano, but creating broader brand awareness is costly
solution: hire a professional cryptocurrency marketing firm to assist with content creation and paid content promotion to raise brand awareness
experience: ad-tech marketing, project development - we are working with a seasoned marketing firm with vast experience promoting crypto initiatives
